posts.post_content:
Dave,

Glad to see another T205 collector on the board. :)

Please send me your want list and how much you would pay for those individual cards you need. I would consider breaking some SGC 60's out of my set since I am generating funds for another T205 purchase.

Contact me at [url]mengle2@insight.rr.com[/url]

Thank you,


Matt E.
